About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans, by arrangement locally.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the Berry District. (60% in-house)

About.Major holdings: Local Associations: Minute books. Local business: Records. Local Newspaper - South Coast Register: Microfilm 1926-1967, file copies 1968-1972. Hospital records: Records book 1922-1988. Berry Papers: Microfilm. Family history: Records.
